Beginning: ^Dude can you read? Those signs kept telling us NOT to come here!
^But I guess now that we're here...
^this looks like the fire alarm from sophmore year!
choice1: ^OMG Hero! You have to remember this right?

c-1: ^Oh yeah, I forgot you don't have your memories...
g-0: ^Guess I have to tell you then don't I!

TheStory1: ^One day, I was at home admiring my super huge muscles in the mirror
^Which was obviously way more important than school...
^Anyways, they were just so nice to look at I ended up loosing track of time...
^I ran towards the school, praying that I wouldn't be late...
^But as I got to the gates, I heard the ring of the fire alarm
^So instead of me rushing inside, everyone else was rushing outside!
^I looked around and spotted you, the widest smirk on your face as you watched the chaos
^After all was said and done, none of the teachers knew I was late!
^<u>*Hero has unlocked the memory mission alarm. you unlocked a new move*<u>

c-0: ^oooooooooh so that was one of your memories...

TheStory2: ^Well then we have to get more of them. I bet if we explore, we can find more!
